channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- App Connect Enterprise Certified Container
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- App Connect Enterprise Certified Container

item.title: CVE-2022-43915|2024-09-21T09:51:18.418Z -- ibm -- app%20connect%20enterprise%20certified%20container
item.description: IBM App Connect Enterprise Certified Container 5.0, 7.1, 7.2, 8.0, 8.1, 8.2, 9.0, 9.1, 9.2, 10.0, 10.1, 11.0, 11.1, 11.2, 11.3, 11.4, 11.5, 11.6, 12.0, and 12.1 does not limit calls to unshare in running Pods. This can allow a user with privileged access to execute commands in a running Pod to elevate their user privileges.

This can allow a user with access to execute commands in a running Pod to elevate their user privileges.

item.description: IBM App Connect Enterprise Certified Container 5.0, 7.1, 7.2, 8.0, 8.1, 8.2, 9.0, 9.1, 9.2, 10.0, 10.1, 11.0, 11.1, 11.2, 11.3, 11.4, 11.5, 11.6, 12.0, and 12.1 does not limit calls to unshare in running Pods.
